author: markt
msg: Correct the documentation for the maxOpenPreparedStatements parameter and review the use of the phrase non-positive throughout the documentation and javadoc, replacing it with negative where that is the correct definition to use.

author: oheger
msg: Added section for next release in changes.xml.

author: jleroux
msg: This fixes "Set field in (at least) widget screen does not take into account a locale for (at least) the Float type" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5453
It actually does more than that. It follows Adrian's proposition of improving the GeoPoint data model.
I did not applies all of Adrian's proposition (see our conversation in the Jira issue). Feel free to apply it completely if you are inclined so.
I will also add an entry in wiki page "Revisions Requiring Data Migration (upgrade ofbiz)" at https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=7045166
